item.title: Setup
item.description: A breakdown of the hardware and software I use for making things, or getting things done. Hardware Modified Dell Keyboard ∙ Lenovo Thinkpad E580 Laptop. Cpu - Intel Core I5-8250U Memory - 12GB Storage - 256GB Samsung SSD Display - 1920x1080 LCD OS - Fedora Linux ∙ Generic Dell Keyboard. A full sized, classic membrane Dell Keyboard from the early noughties.
